kobe.KBpointings.galaxies.removep_file¶

galaxies.removep_file(self, split=' ', nest=False, data=None, filename=None, filetype=None, nside=512, **kwargs)¶

remove fields by input file

Parameters
filenamestring

name of file mush contain fovra and fovdec, so that define vertices

filetypestring

type of file, options: txt (plain text), npz (pickle file)

wdirstring

working directory for file

nsideint

healpix nside parameter, must be a power of 2, less than 2**30

nestbool

healpix ordering options: if True, healpix map use nest ordering, otherwise, use ring instead

splitstring

if filetype is txt, the string defined to split each lines default: ‘ ‘ (space)

Examples

>>> from kobe import galaxies
>>> a = galaxies()
>>> a.generatep(limdec=[-20,90], limdist=[0,40])              
>>> a.removep_file(filename='tmp.npz')

sn_data_analysis: sdapy
